mapper.insert: insert into sp_order (id, code, pay_type, pay_amount, order_source, drawee, order_pay_time, order_code, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{payType}, #{payAmount}, #{orderSource}, #{drawee}, #{orderPayTime}, #{orderCode}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy})
mapper.update: update sp_order set id = #{id}, code = #{code}, pay_type = #{payType}, pay_amount = #{payAmount}, order_source = #{orderSource}, drawee = #{drawee}, order_pay_time = #{orderPayTime}, order_code = #{orderCode}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_by = #{createBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy} where id = #{id}
